# Save on Azure SQL with Azure Hybrid Benefit

[Home](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/)[Microsoft](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/category/microsoft/), [Microsoft Azure](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/category/microsoft/microsoft-azure/), [SQL Server](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/category/microsoft/sql-server-microsoft-it/)Save on Azure SQL with Azure Hybrid Benefit

In this episode of the [Azure Essentials Show](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/tag/azure-essentials-show/), [Thomas Maurer](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch) and [Debbie Lyons](https://www.linkedin.com/in/debbilyons/) delve into the benefits and features of Azure SQL, a family of fully managed, secure, and intelligent SQL database services. They discuss how Azure SQL can streamline data management and reduce costs, highlighting options for different stages of cloud adoption, including SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and Azure SQL Database. Key points include the significant cost savings of up to 55% with Azure Hybrid Benefit, the security features of Azure SQL, and an exciting preview of an architectural upgrade to the general-purpose service tier for SQL Managed Instance, promising better performance at the same cost.

## Azure Hybrid Benefit

Azure Hybrid Benefit is an [Azure offer](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/offers/) that helps organizations reduce expenses during their migration to the cloud. By providing Azure discounts on [Windows](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/windows-server/) and [SQL Server](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/azure-sql/?msockid=211defa715746377255bfb2a14b0629f) licenses, and [Linux](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/linux-on-azure/) subscriptions, it supports [infrastructure modernization](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/migration/migrate-modernize-innovate/) and a cloud-first strategy.

Azure Hybrid Benefit coverage includes [Azure VMware Solution](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/azure-vmware/), [Nutanix](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/baremetal-infrastructure/workloads/nc2-on-azure/about-nc2-on-azure), and other services through [Windows Server](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/windows-server/) with [Software Assurance](https://www.microsoft.com/licensing/licensing-programs/software-assurance-by-benefits) or Subscription, plus support for [RedHat and SUSE Enterprise Linux](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/linux-on-azure/) customers.

## Azure Hybrid Benefit – Azure SQL Database & SQL Managed Instance

Azure Hybrid Benefit enables you to exchange your existing licenses for discounted rates on Azure SQL Database and Azure SQL Managed Instance. By utilizing your Software Assurance-enabled SQL Server licenses on Azure, you can save up to 30 percent or more on SQL Database and SQL Managed Instance. The Azure Hybrid Benefit page includes a calculator to help determine potential savings.

With Azure Hybrid Benefit, you pay only for the underlying Azure infrastructure by utilizing your existing SQL Server license for the SQL Server database engine itself (Base Compute pricing). Without Azure Hybrid Benefit, you pay for both the underlying infrastructure and the SQL Server license (License-Included pricing).
